content: When I empty the SPAM folder the SPAM mails get into my IN folder i.s.o. disappearing. This is realy anoying because it takes a lot of time then to delete these SPAM mails one by one from the IN folder. Can you help me to solve this problem please? Thanks in advance, Jan
creator: jan.hellebaut

title: IMAP syncing: two questions about email downloads
content:
I set up a new Thunderbird account on my PC for my wife. It is a hotmail.com account and it uses IMAP.

I was surprised when we downloaded all her emails only to see them also remain on the hotmail server. After researching this, I found out that this is normal behaviour for IMAP and the exact opposite of POP. My wife would prefer that downloaded emails are removed from the hotmail server. Is this possible?

While researching the above issue, I saw an article that talked about the option to have the full emails downloaded or only stubs (everything but the email body from what I can gather). While consuming more local space and taking longer to download, the full download would mean local backup captures the full email and also email can be reviewed even if the internet connection is down. Where do I navigate to in TB to find the setting that determines full or stub download?

Thanks
creator: dgillesp220

title: Importing labels with Google Contacts
content:
I have all my contacts in Google Contacts organized with labels. But when I sync them to Thunderbird, the labels are gone and its just one list of 578 contacts.

How can I organize my contacts so that the categories (or labels) show up on both Google Contacts and in Thunderbird?

Thanks!

title: Passare da pop3 a IMAP: fase di solo passaggio rispetto all'obiettivo finale di salvare tutte le pec della mia casella Aruba in Thunderbird e poterle  poi così cancellare da Aruba recuperando lo spazio gratis
content: Grazie ai vs suggerimenti sono finalmente riuscito ad arrivare a Configura un account email esistente, ma, purtroppo, ho tentato, prima, la configurazione automatica e poi quella manuale, ottenendo peraltro lo stesso identico risultato, ossia la scritta in campo giallo: Impossibile autenticarsi sul server. La configurazione, il nome utente o la password potrebbero essere errati. Ho verificato più volte e non ho commesso errori su nome utente e password; come posso andare avanti e giungere a conclusione? Grazie !
creator: guelfoungaro

title: RSS feeds titles turn blue when fetching new articles then turn black again even when not opened
content:
Hello !

It's been like this for as far as I've been using Thunderbird :

I have a lot of RSS feeds accounts and, when fetching all the new articles, the title of the feeds (left column) with new articles turn blue, so one knows where to look and where not to. Once opened, the title of the feed turn black again and one can see a yellow star in front of every new article.

But, for some unknown reason, some (most) of them (out of several dozens) quickly turn back to black even though I do not open them, and all the stars have also disappeared. As a consequence, I do not know which feeds have been updated, and when I opened the ones who have spontaneously turned back to black, I can't tell which articles are new (and it is sometimes hard to tell, especially when they're not sorted chronologically in the feed of if I don't recall which was the last one before fetching).

Thanks a lot for considering this issue. And thank you for the great and continued job.
creator: autonum

title: Importing an mbox file
content: Hello, How do I import an mbox file (which is from an olm file from my Outlook email app) into my Thunderbird app version 102.14.0(64 bit) on my 21.5" iMac running Ventura 13.5.1? Thanks for any help. I want to get rid of Outlook as Microsoft keeps changing it and I have many years of emails that I want to keep! Woodrow Gray
creator: leoman1

title: Yahoo mail stopped downloading email to TB. Also stopped putting sent email in Sent folder.
content: On 8/21 Yahoo mail stopped downloading to my Thunderbird. I have been trying to fix this since it started. I have learned a lot, but nothing I have done has fixed the problem. I went to Yahoo, learned about oauth authorization, & generated their 16 digit one time login password. I deleted all my saved yahoo passwords on TB. I logged out of TB & back in, but did not get a 'login' popup. The little dot in the tab of the Inbox just bounces back & forth incessantly. I finally saw where I had to send an email to get the 'enter password' popup window. The problem is that I instead of that, got a 'sending message' popup window with the processing bar doing its thing and a status of 'Copying message to sent folder'. It's just stuck there. BTW - This only affects my Yahoo account. My gmail account works normally. What have I missed?
creator: OldTex

title: Google Meet in Calendar
content: Is there a way to add a Google Meet within the calendar settings?...something like Google Workspace where a meeting automatically creates a Google Meet link/invite for attendees. Thanks.

title: Thunderbird looses characters while typing
content: Ever since version 115 came out, Thunderbird is failing me for the fundamental task of typing text. As I type, it frequently freezes for a second or two, and any characters typed during the freeze are lost. This can happen in any text field. I do not have this problem in any other applications (nor was it a problem before version 115). Running on macOS 13.5.1, currently Thunderbird 115.2.0 (that is, up-to-date). Any debugging suggestions?
creator: James6M

title: Files & Attachments -> Preview in Thunderbird. Tab can not remember attachment (after Supernova)
content:
Hi to everyone,

I'm using Fedora KDE spin, Flatpak (from Flathub) version of Thunderbird.

part of my workflow was that I could have PDFs (my work schedules) open as separate tabs next to Mails, Calender. Even when I closed Thunderbird, the tabs with the PDFs were opened correctly. Now after upgrading to Supernova, the tab does not remember the file and it becomes the empty tab instead of the "Preview in Thunderbird" PDF. Mails themselves stay open as tabs, but files/attachments from mails do not.

I really liked this feature because I could compare calendars and work schedules well. Does this come back?

Is this a bug, or is this now standard? Does anyone else recognize this?

Kind regards
creator: ave.wallenstein

title: Passare da pop3 a IMAP: fase di solo passaggio rispetto all'obiettivo finale di salvare tutte le pec della mia casella Aruba in Thunderbird e poterle  poi così cancellare da Aruba recuperando lo spazio gratis
content:
Mi scuso per le reiterate richieste, ma sono un utente inesperto; riassumo il problema: mi prefiggo l'obiettivo finale di recuperare spazio gratis sulla mai casella pec di Aruba, attualmente praticamente piena. Voglio, quindi, salvare tutte le mie pec mediante Thunderbird e poter poi così cancella le pec presenti in Aruba recuperando il relativo spazio gratis. In fase di installazione di Thunderbird ho erroneamente selezionato il protocollo pop3, scaricando così solo le pec in arrivo. Mi è stato suggerito di passare al protocollo IMAP, ma mi sono arenato alla prima istruzione per creare l'account IMAP in quanto non trovo in alcun modo il menu File , con quel che segue. 

Creare l'account IMAP

Aprire il menu File > Nuovo > Account email esistente. Se la strada intrapresa rispetto all'obiettivo finale è sbagliata, ditemelo oppure, se è corretta, aiutatemi ad andare avanti e a raggiungerlo. Grazie!
creator: guelfoungaro

title: Rearrange The Order Of My Accounts (after Supernova)
content:
Hi to everyone,

I'm using Fedora KDE spin, Flatpak (from Flathub) version of Thunderbird.

Since the upgrade to Supernova I can not change the order of my accounts as it is described in this article: https://blog.thunderbird.net/2022/08/thunderbird-tips-rearrange-the-order-of-your-accounts/

I do not know, if it's on behalf of Fedora (Linux), or the Flatpak or the package in general.

Kind regards

creator: rachel32

title: Upozornění na nově příchozí zprávy
content:
Dobrý den, prosím o pomoc s nastavením.

Jedná se mi o to, že v případě, kdy přijde nová pošta tak se mi zobrazí upozornění, ale upozornění na zprávu se okamžitě smaže - např. pokud zapnu e-mail po víkendu tak mne emailový klient nezobrazí a neoznačí nové zprávy a nejsem na ně upozorněn.

To samé pokud mi přijde nová zpráva a nejsem u PC tak mi e-mailový klient nepíše žádné upozornění (např. u e-mailového účtu není zobrazena např. č. 1 - jako 1 nová zpráva - respektive je, ale asi jenom pár vteřin, a to danou zprávu ani neotevřu).

Nevíte jak toto nastavit? V nastavení je sekce Příchozí pošta, kde mám nastaveno zobrazit upozornění a zároveň v tlačítku přizpůsobit jsem zaškrtl nejdelší možný čas což je 3.600 vteřin - i přesto se mi upozornění na novou zprávu odmaže ihned a neřeší mě to např. zprávy o víkendu - v pondělí musím hledat, které zprávy přišly.

Díky za pomoc!
creator: balage112

bold text

creator: overthemoon

title: Conversazione non funziona dopo l'aggiornamento
content: Buongiorno, uso Thunderbird in ambito aziendale. Recentemente hanno aggiornato il programma alla versione 115.1.1 (64 bit). Dopo l'aggiornamento la funzione "Mostra messaggi nella conversazione" (tasto Conversazione, vedi immagine allegata) non funziona più correttamente. Online ho trovato solo articoli riguardanti la funzione Discussione (threads) erroneamente confusa con la funzione Conversazione. Purtroppo non ho riscontrato un comportamento univoco: con alcune conversazioni funziona, con altre funziona solo parzialmente, con altre non funziona affatto. Ci sono dei parametri da settare per far funzionare correttamente la Conversazione? Con la versione precedente tutto funzionava bene per i messaggi sul server di posta, mentre non ha mai funzionato per i messaggi archiviati in locale. Grazie dell'attenzione,
creator: federico.p1971

title: Not downloading new emails but does in safe mode
content:
In the last few days I am unable to download new emails in normal mode but can in safe mode. I am running Win 11 22621.2215 and T/B 115.2.0. This is happening on all my network computers. I can send emails without any problems. My wife's computer works fine. I have the same problem using my normal ISP and using a mobile internet connection.

i can log in and download using my phone with Aqua Mail

It would seem that some process in Win 11 is now blocking email downloads. I have disabled my Antivirus and Malwarebytes.I have used the troubleshooter, disabled addons etc. No Change. Reinstalled T/B and connected to original profile. No change. Connected to an old profile. No change. Any ideas as to why this is suddenly happening.

title: Problems in setting up GMail
content: Hi, was using Thunderbird with GMail on an old PC, now broken. Two months ago we migrated from Aruba, an Italian mail provider, to Gmail. Now I have a new PC and I downloaded the latest version of Thunderbird. I don't know why, but the automatic settings of Thunderbird is still showing me the old Aruba servers and not the ones of GMail. I called Google Workspaces assistance and they said it's ok from their side, my GMail account is set up correctly. If I try to setup the account manually, the message I receive is that Thunderbird cannot connect to GMail. Who is telling Thunderbird that until two months ago my provider was Aruba? PC and app are brand new... I attach three screensghots Thank you for your help!

title: New Message Indicator Behaviour
content:
Hello;

First thank you very much for the Thunderbird software; I am a keen user and donate from time to time.

I have just switched to the new version 115.2.x which is awesome but for one little change around RSS feeds. The "new message" indicator (little yellow star) signals "new messages". In the older versions of Thunderbird, when one swapped between news subscriptions, the indicator would remain until that subscription is refreshed. With the new version however, when one navigates between subscriptions, the indicator is removed.

Is it possible to get the old behaviour back or have this configurable at all?

content:
Hello,

I can receive, but I can't reply.

I've been having trouble today sending emails via Thunderbird with my Hotmail account(s), I see a timeout error -

Sending of the message failed The message could not be sent because the connection to the Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.office365.com timed out. Try again


I do not see the same issue with the Outlook mail client.

creator: svaardt

title: Issues with receiving/sending emails via Thunderbird & VPN
content:
Good afternoon,

I recently moved to China and I have to go through a VPN for most of the web surfing. However wether the VPN is on or off I can't send emails via Thunderbird (Error message saying that it can't connect to SMTP) and receiving them is so-so.

I contacted the VPN support system, their recommandation was to get the fastest server, which I did and it did not change anything.

I am assuming the issue lies with Thunderbird because on my mobile phone I go through the Gmail app and it works whenever the VPN is connected.

Is there any port setting or other setting I should change on Thunderbird to make it work ?

I never had issues with receiving/sending emails with Thunderbird prior to that.

Thanks in advance,

Full error message :

L’envoi du message a échoué. Le message n’a pas pu être envoyé car la connexion au serveur sortant (SMTP) « smtp.gmail.com » a échoué. Le serveur est peut-être indisponible ou refuse les connexions SMTP. Veuillez vérifier que les paramètres de votre serveur sortant (SMTP) sont corrects et essayez à nouveau.
